sentences.sContent: I’ve got a very stubborn streak (= a tendency to be stubborn ) .
Paul can be as stubborn as a mule (= very stubborn ) .
...The new indicator is a "propaganda device" to promote income redistribution by showing that poverty is stubborn or increasing...

synos.tran: 顽固的；顽强的；难处理的

phrases.pCn: 事实是不容改变的东西

remMethod.val: stub(存根) ＋ born(生) → 像生了根一样 → 顽固的

trans.tranOther: determined not to change your mind, even when people think you are being unreasonable
